name: Companies manufacturing goods for others that provided designs or specifications for those goods, by company size: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2022 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2021.
